label: 本補地頭
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Military followers granted the title of military estate steward (jitō) and appointed to lands confiscated from the defeated enemy after the Gempei War (1180-5) by Minamoto Yoritomo as reward for their loyalty.　[地頭、源平合戦、源頼朝]
